Posts.Content: After the PSA's and biopsies, CT scans ,etc reports of 3+ 3 Gleason scores (only 2 ) . I'm at the point where I need to DO SOMETHING ! I don't think I'm mentally wired to do the watchful waiting thing and have friends that had poor results with radiation treatments soooo..... I'm looking for personal experiences with Robotic RP surgeons in NW Indiana . The standard wisdom seems to be " get your ass to U of C or North Western " but I'd like to stay local if I'm not making a big medical mistake ! Any thoughts? Thanks, Roger
